TopicTitle: ksp crashes just after its finished loading (ubuntu)

Articles.Content: i recently installed ubuntu on my computer, and i tried running ksp on it and it keeps crashing just as its finished loading and often crashes the whole system with it. My computer is, admittedly, underpowered for ksp (1.4ghz core 2 duo, 4gb of ram and intel integrated gpu) but it was running fine on windows so i think its an os problem . I dont know how to send the logfile, but i looked through it and there were some warnings, but none at the end of the loading, which is when it crashes.
